descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Leonid Follower[/size]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/2awFWiX][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1868/44323190401_040f53de9e_b.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=5]Update log[/size]
v1.01 Face expression and brawl bug fixed

[size=5][url=https://flic.kr/p/29brC6z][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1843/43437710875_3f7faab07a_b.jpg[/img][/url]
Introduction[/size]
Standalone male follower
No DLC required
Voice type: Male young eager
Combat style: spell sword
You can see him at sleeping giant inn
Marriageable


[url=https://flic.kr/p/LLMcL6][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1887/29386443217_f84a4cf77d_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=5]Recommended mods[/size]
Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO by cloudedtruth
Face to face conversation by towawot
Sima Mod-Better lighting by Askinnn_80
Follower controling mod


[url=https://flic.kr/p/29rfWth][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1890/43605373894_4b9b604d7c_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=5]Credits[/size]
Real Woman of Skyrim by Gearhog
SG hair pack by hellosanta
Enhanced Character Edit by tktk 
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
HN66s Long Eye Lashes by humannature66
Maevan2's eye brows by Maevan2
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
Smooth body textures for Better Males and SOS
Fair Men Skin Rtexture and bonuses for males by RomeoZero 
UNP Texture Blender by Lunyra
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended by Groovtama

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2awCuRR][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1849/44322519451_0ceb872b14_b.jpg[/img][/url]

Gearhog
higanbanamanju
